dcterms:creator: F. O. Catak
A. F. Yazı
dcterms:description: This dataset contains sequences of Windows Operating System API calls obtained within the Cuckoo Sandbox isolated environment for each malware file, with malware family labels determined using unique hash codes.
dcterms:title: Catak Dataset

dcterms:creator: A. Oliveira
R. Sassi
dcterms:description: This dataset includes 42,797 malware and 1,079 benign API call sequences obtained via Cuckoo Sandbox for dynamic malware analysis, focusing on the first 100 non-consecutive API calls to reduce complexity.
dcterms:title: Oliveira Dataset

dcterms:creator: B. Düzgün
A. Çayır
F. Demirkıran
C. N. Kayha
B. Gençaydın
H. Dağ
dcterms:description: This dataset consists of unique hash codes representing malware samples obtained from Virus Share, with corresponding API call sequences and malware families extracted from Virus Total.
dcterms:title: VirusShare Dataset

dcterms:creator: B. Düzgün
A. Çayır
F. Demirkıran
C. N. Kayha
B. Gençaydın
H. Dağ
dcterms:description: This dataset includes malware samples taken by Virus Sample, with unique hash codes and corresponding API calls and malware families obtained from Virus Total.
dcterms:title: VirusSample Dataset
